Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 59th/Bishop
ShortDescription: Eastbound 59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, Ashland, 63rd, Racine and 59th due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, Ashland, 63rd, Racine and 59th due to street blockage near 59th/Bishop.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
